title: CAN THIS PC RUN LOL ON MEDIUM LOW 100 FPS
body:
LENOVO 110 15ast 80TR003MYA
Procesor A9-940
Video card AMD R16M-M1-30
Ram 4 GB
500 GB memory

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Walrei,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EtA22dEK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-02-15T20:53:30.988+0000)
>
> Please reply

It can, but not 100 FPS - the monitor is 60Hz, so anything over 60 fps will just look worse and make reaction time/gameplay worse.

The CPU is also very poor, RAM is low, and you can get a much better modern laptop for about 300$, with over twice the memory and speed.

> [{quoted}](name=Walrei,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EtA22dEK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-02-15T20:53:30.988+0000)
>
> Please reply

Yes, you should be able to have it on high though.
